title: NA dosen't exist its just EUR and KR
body:
Are we so bad that we have to make half of our players of Europeans and Koreans? In NA half of every team is made of of European and Korean players and the other half is NA players, why is this? It's not like that in Europe and every other region.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=SerMichael,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-04T22:28:40.191+0000)
>
> Are we so bad that we have to make half of our players of Europeans and Koreans?

Yes.

> [{quoted}](name=SerMichael,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-04-04T22:28:40.191+0000)
>
> why is this?

Europe and Korea are better at the game.  I don't know why.  Maybe we should blame the match-making system?

> [{quoted}](name=JRobin31,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-04-05T16:24:46.204+0000)
>
> Yes.
> 
> Europe and Korea are better at the game.  I don't know why.  Maybe we should blame the match-making system?

LOL, I can agree with that. I don't understand why I was downvoted though. {{sticker:sg-janna}}
no there's only KR. why would anyone watch anything other than KR
Value of the competition. I know you're just pandering to the OP, but I don't get all that much value out of KR, slightly more so out of this split.
no i legit don't watch anything other than KR. only KZ, to be more specific. watched dom's vod review of an NA game and it reminded me why i don't watch NA
This is a weird way of outright region bashing. And you don't even include China in the attempt!

NA players are just shit at games in general.

Same in any MMO - the EU server is always far more mature, intelligent and organized, and the asian servers are always in the lead of competitive or cooperative challenging content.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-04T22:47:39.018+0000)
>
> NA players are just shit at games in general.
> 
> Same in any MMO - the EU server is always far more mature, intelligent and organized, and the asian servers are always in the lead of competitive or cooperative challenging content.

More mature my rump.  You think you know Toxic?  You know nothing John Snow.   EUW is totally toxic.  The troll factor is through the roof. 
 It's just that EU's two servers together combine for 2.5 times the player base the NA server has.

> [{quoted}](name=BigBellBrute,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-04T23:39:24.464+0000)
>
> More mature my rump.  You think you know Toxic?  You know nothing John Snow.   EUW is totally toxic.  The troll factor is through the roof. 
>  It's just that EU's two servers together combine for 2.5 times the player base the NA server has.

Having experienced both, i can very surely say EU players tend to be _far_ more mature and polite, in any game.
Sounds a little biased to me. Your small sampling does not comprise the whole...

> [{quoted}](name=Percentages,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-04-05T00:06:31.571+0000)
>
> Sounds a little biased to me. Your small sampling does not comprise the whole...

Strange. It is a pretty big sample, and widely accepted as true by anyone with a brain in said games. hopping to EU for trading/social stuff is common in some.

Just because you dont like it does not make it fake.
Well, that is your OPINION. And opinions are like assholes, everyone has one and they usually stink...

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=dvbYFv8w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-04T22:47:39.018+0000)
>
> NA players are just shit at games in general.
> 
> Same in any MMO - the EU server is always far more mature, intelligent and organized, and the asian servers are always in the lead of competitive or cooperative challenging content.

That being said, EUW and EUNE servers are known to be quite toxic hell holes (which is like all of the other servers, but they somehow get special, though not exclusive, reputation for it). So maybe I wouldn't give them the "mature" tag just yet.

There's a lot of imports in Europe as well.

The biggest thing we seem to import is mid laners. Our junglers and bots seem to do really well though.
